outputs.output_descr: Support Ministry of Finance (Ministry Of Finance) through Policy Advisory Group in 1. providing timely policy advice on urgent, ad-hoc matters to Ministry of Finance's management; 2. research and studies in public finance; 3. development of policy analysis and forecasting systems within Ministry Of Finance; 4. round table discussions 5. training for policy makers

project_descr: SUPPORT FOR PUBLIC FINANCIAL POLICY ANALYSIS  (FPAII - MOF)
project_title: SUPPORT FOR PUBLIC FINANCIAL POLICY ANALYSIS
